text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zai-org/Open-AutoGLM | 97% | stars now 16021 → est 35490 (range 35429-35551)
   https://github.com/zai-org/Open-AutoGLM
2) eooce/Gla-deploy | 93% | stars now 1020 → est 4401 (range 4376-4426)
   https://github.com/eooce/Gla-deploy
3) HKUDS/Paper2Slides | 91% | stars now 2107 → est 4292 (range 4267-4317)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/Paper2Slides
4) tombcato/clash-ip-checker | 89% | stars now 685 → est 2457 (range 2432-2482)
   https://github.com/tombcato/clash-ip-checker
5) TanShilongMario/PromptFill | 88% | stars now 738 → est 1441 (range 1416-1466)
   https://github.com/TanShilongMario/PromptFill

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
